faqs.question: Can core branches take part in hackathon ?
faqs.answer: Yes, they can take part in hackathons.

faqs.question: How do I register for events in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: You can register for the events in the "Events" section on VTOP.

faqs.question: Is there any cost for participation?
faqs.answer: No, all the events are free of cost in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: What kind of technical skills will I gain from attending Yantra'25 events?
faqs.answer: Yantra'25 will help you develop problem-solving, teamwork, and technical skills like coding and prototyping. It will enhance creativity, time management, and presentation abilities while providing exposure to new tools, mentorship, and networking opportunities.

faqs.question: Will I get refreshments for events?
faqs.answer: Refreshments will be provided for the overnight event from the respected chapter/club.

faqs.question: What devices are allowed in the events?
faqs.answer: All the devices are allowed during the span of the event.

faqs.question: Do I need to have prior skills to attend events?
faqs.answer: Yantra'25 is a beginner friendly tech event.

faqs.question: How many events are there in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: There are 67 events in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: What is Central Hackathon?
faqs.answer: Central hack is the official hacakathon of the yantra organised by VIT.

faqs.question: What are the timings for the OD?
faqs.answer: The OD will be provided for the event time.

faqs.question: Do we have on spot OD?
faqs.answer: No, you don't have on spot OD in Yantra'25. You need to register on VTOP.

faqs.question: Are tech competitions team based or solo?
faqs.answer: There are solo events as well as team based events.

faqs.question: If OD is not updated, whom to contact?
faqs.answer: Point of Contact(POC) will be responsible for the OD of the event.

faqs.question: How do I prepare for attending a tech talk?
faqs.answer: To prepare for a tech talk, research the topic and speaker, bring a notebook or device for notes, and review any pre-talk materials. Prepare questions and arrive early to engage with attendees and make the most of the session.

faqs.question: Who can attend a tech talk?
faqs.answer: Everyone, who are interested, can attend Tech talk .

faqs.question: What is the judging criteria in events?
faqs.answer: Each tech event have different judging criteria and based on it, the judging of the event will be handled under the supervision of the faculty coordinator

faqs.question: What are the types of events in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: The types of events in Yantra'25 are hackathons, workshops, guest lectures, competitions and tech talks.

faqs.question: Whats the duration of Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: The duration is from 3rd February till 9th February, a span of one week.

faqs.question: Are external participants allowed to participate in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: No external participants are not allowed to participate in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Are meals and accomodation provided in hackathons?
faqs.answer: No meals and accomodation are provided in hackathons, only refreshments are provided for overnight events.

faqs.question: How many times do I need to scan my ID card for getting OD?
faqs.answer: Every day during the event you have to scan the ID card for getting OD. The coordinators will guide you

faqs.question: Will I get a participation certificate?
faqs.answer: No, you will not be provided with a participation certificate.

faqs.question: How will the cash prizes deposited to the winner?
faqs.answer: The cash prize will be directly sent to your bank account registered on the VTOP.

faqs.question: When can we expect the result of the event?
faqs.answer: All the results will be declared after conclusion of Yantra'25 or the event.

faqs.question: Will I get physical or E-certificates?
faqs.answer: No, you will not get either of them.

faqs.question: Am I allowed to bring food in events?
faqs.answer: No, you are not allowed to bring food in the event.

faqs.question: Will I have to apply for nightslips for overnight event?
faqs.answer: No, you dont have to apply for night slips.

faqs.question: Should I apply for nightslips for overnight events?
faqs.answer: No, you should not apply for the night slip for overnight events.

faqs.question: What are overnight events?
faqs.answer: An overnight event is an event that spans over the night .

faqs.question: When will I get the problem statement for the hackathon?
faqs.answer: It will be provided on the day of the event..

faqs.question: What is hackathon?
faqs.answer: A hackathon is a collaborative and timed event to create innovative solutions.

faqs.question: What is Designathon?
faqs.answer: A Designathon is a collaborative event where designers solve creative challenges, focusing on user experience, aesthetics, and innovation within constraints.

faqs.question: What is Ideathon?
faqs.answer: An Ideathon  is a brainstorming event where participants generate innovative ideas to solve specific challenges, focusing on creativity, feasibility, and impact.

faqs.question: When am I supposed to report at the venue?
faqs.answer: You are supposed to reach the venue 15 min prior to the event.

faqs.question: What is additional learning?
faqs.answer: Yantra'25 is beginner friendly tech event no need of additional learning.

faqs.question: Can one of my teammates participate from room?
faqs.answer: No, they must be physically present during the event.

faqs.question: Who is organizing Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: The student's welfare office is organising Yantra'25 along with clubs and chapters.

faqs.question: What is a tech talk?
faqs.answer: A Tech Talk is a presentation or discussion where experts share insights, trends, and knowledge on specific technology-related topics or innovations.

faqs.question: Can I register for more than one event?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can register for more than one event.

faqs.question: Can I enter late to an event? if yes then how late?
faqs.answer: You need to enter the event 15 minutes prior the given time slot.

faqs.question: Will I get port to charge my laptop?
faqs.answer: Yes, plug points will be provided for charging.

faqs.question: Do I need to bring my laptop?
faqs.answer: Yes, you should bring your own laptop to the event.

faqs.question: Am I allowed to leave the venue in middle of the event?
faqs.answer: If you are eliminated, you can leave the venue based on the event.

faqs.question: What is a POC?
faqs.answer: POC stands for Point of Contact or the person you should contact if you have any queries about the event.

faqs.question: What do I do if my events are clashing?
faqs.answer: You can attend any one event.

faqs.question: Whom do I contact if theres any issue during the events?
faqs.answer: Contact the POC of the event or the volunteer present during the event.

faqs.question: While registering for team events, does only one person need to register or all ?
faqs.answer: No, all the team members have to register for the event.

faqs.question: Whom to contact if I lose something during the event?
faqs.answer: Contact the POC of the event or the volunteer present during the event.

faqs.question: How will I get updates for each of the events?
faqs.answer: Join the Yantra official instagram account to get all the recent updates.

faqs.question: Can I use an AI software during the event?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can take the assitance of AI software in your projects.

faqs.question: I dont have a laptop can i still participate in the hackathon?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can participate in the event.

faqs.question: I dont have a group can i still participate in the Yantra'25 competions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can participate in Yantra'25 competitions.

faqs.question: Are freshers allowed to participate in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yes, freshers are welcome to take part in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Can different year student form a team together?
faqs.answer: Yes, students from different years can take part together.

faqs.question: Are equipment provided in events?
faqs.answer: If it is a hardware-based event, then the needed materials will be provided.

faqs.question: Is outside food delivery allowed during night time in hackathon?
faqs.answer: No, outside food delivery is not alllowed during the event.

faqs.question: When is the last day to register for the events?
faqs.answer: The event registration deadline is January 25th.

faqs.question: When will the registration start for the events in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Registration for Yantra will open on January 18th.

faqs.question: Are scholars and masters students allowed to participate in the event?
faqs.answer: Yes, scholars and masters students are allowed to take part in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Do I need to be a part of the chapter to attend their events?
faqs.answer: To participate in Yantra'25, you do not have to be a member of a club or chapter.

faqs.question: Can I go to attend my lab in between the event?
faqs.answer: You can ask the organiser for leaving the event in between.

faqs.question: Is there a dress code for attending the event?
faqs.answer: No, there isn't any specific dress code for attending the event.

faqs.question: Will I get OD if I leave in between the event?
faqs.answer: You cannot leave the venue in between the event unless and until you are informed to leave.

faqs.question: Will there be a girl volunteer for overnight event?
faqs.answer: Yes, a female volunteer will be present during the overnight event.

faqs.question: If I have medical emergency will I get extra time to submit?
faqs.answer: No, you will not be given extra time to submit your work.

faqs.question: Are clubs and chapters organising events in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yes, Clubs and Chapters are organizing events in Yantra'25 along with Office of Students' Welfare.

faqs.question: What is CC?
faqs.answer: CC is the abbreviation for clubs and chapters.

faqs.question: Can boys and girls be in the same team?
faqs.answer: Yes, the teams can be co-ed.

faqs.question: How will hostel attendance be taken for overnight events?
faqs.answer: The hostel attendance will be taken at the event venue itself for boys.

faqs.question: Are there any premium events in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: No, there aren't any paid events in Yantra'25. All events are free of cost.

faqs.question: Can I take help from Youtube tutorials during the event?
faqs.answer: Indeed, you may use Youtube videos to your advantage duing events.

faqs.question: Will we get OD as audience in events?
faqs.answer: There will be no ODs for any audience.

faqs.question: Are audience allowed in events?
faqs.answer: Events are not permitted to have audience.

faqs.question: Will OD get processed on the same day?
faqs.answer: No, ODs will not be processed on the same day.

faqs.question: Will they give us a tutorial before starting the hackathon?
faqs.answer: They will guide you properly for the hackathon.

faqs.question: When is Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yantra'25 begins on February 3rd and ends on Feburary 9th.

faqs.question: What is Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yantra'25 is a week of technical innovation.

faqs.question: What if I am unable to register for an event?
faqs.answer: You need to register on VTOP for the event otherwise you cannot attend the event.

faqs.question: I accidentaly registered for an event, what do I do?
faqs.answer: If you have to attend the event you can otherwise you won't get OD.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my registration for an event?
faqs.answer: No, you cannot cancel registration for any event.

faqs.question: Can I register on spot?
faqs.answer: You cannot register for any event on the spot.

faqs.question: Is there any pre-requisite to attend workshops?
faqs.answer: No prerequisities exist for attending workshops.

faqs.question: What should I bring to a workshop?
faqs.answer: Bring a notebook, laptop, charger, pre-workshop materials and work samples.

faqs.question: What is workshop?
faqs.answer: A workshop is an interactive session where participants gain practical skills, knowledge, or experience through hands-on activities and expert guidance.

faqs.question: Are workshops free?
faqs.answer: Yes every event is free in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Will I get certificate for workshops?
faqs.answer: No, you will not receive any certificate for participating in workshops.

faqs.question: Can we organize our own events in Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Only clubs and chapters can organize events in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Do I need to be a nine pointer to attend events?
faqs.answer: No, anyone can register for any event.

faqs.question: Whats the difference between workshops and seminars?
faqs.answer: No, workshops are different from seminars and webinars. Workshops are interactive and focus on hands-on learning with activities or group work, making them ideal for developing practical skills

faqs.question: Will there be volunteers to assist us during the events?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be volunteers present during the whole event.

faqs.question: Can I become a volunteer in Yantra?
faqs.answer: No, you cannot become a volunteer in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: How do I become a volunteer in Yantra?
faqs.answer: You need to be a part of any clubs and chapters or student council member to be a volunteer

faqs.question: Will there be any online events?
faqs.answer: There are no online events in Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Can i record the Tech talk and Guest lecture?
faqs.answer: No recording is not allowed during tech talk or guest lecture.

faqs.question: For hardware hackathons will you provide hardware materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, we will provide hardware materials.

faqs.question: During daytime,will we have breaks for lunch,dinner and snacks in between hackathon or tech competitions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll be given breaks during meal times.

faqs.question: During daytime,will we have breaks for lunch,dinner and snacks in between workshops or tech talks?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will be given breaks during meal times.

faqs.question: Is there any theme for Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: The theme for Yantra'25 is AI and SDGs.

faqs.question: Will classes be held during Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yes, classes will be held during Yantra'25

faqs.question: What is the procedure for  girls living in hostel for overnight event?
faqs.answer: You'll just have to give your attedance and details at the hostel security gate, no need to apply for nightslip.

faqs.question: By what time should girls leave their hostel block for overnight events?
faqs.answer: You should leave your hostel block before 9:30 PM and reach the venue.

faqs.question: By what time should boys leave their hostel block for overnight events?
faqs.answer: You should leave your hostel block before 9:30 PM and reach the venue.

faqs.question: What are the timing for the overnight hackathon?
faqs.answer: The timings for overnight hackathons is generally 9:30 PM to 6:00 AM.

faqs.question: Can we go outside the campus during Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can go outside the campus according to the regular norms.

faqs.question: Am I allowed to move inside campus after 9:30pm during Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: No, you are not allowed to move inside campus after 9:30PM during Yantra'25.

faqs.question: What is the Instagram handle for Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: You can check us out at https://www.instagram.com/yantra_sw/ .

faqs.question: what is difference between tech talk and hackathons?
faqs.answer: A Tech Talk is an educational event where experts share insights on specific technologies or trends, usually through presentations. A Hackathon, on the other hand, is a collaborative, hands-on event where participants work intensively to build projects or solve problems within a set timeframe.

faqs.question: Will there be a live-streaming option for any sessions or competitions?
faqs.answer: No, there will not be any live-streaming options for any sessions or competitions.

faqs.question: Can I leave the venue during overnight event?
faqs.answer: No, you cannot leave the venue till 6:00 AM.

faqs.question: Is there a dedicated helpdesk for participants during the event?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be a dedicated helpdesk during the event.

faqs.question: can participants get sample problem statements for practice?
faqs.answer: No, sample problems won't be provided for practice.

faqs.question: Are there any live demonstrations of new technologies during Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yes there will be live demonstrations of new technologies during Yantra'25.

faqs.question: Will there be coding challenges tailored for beginners?
faqs.answer: No, there will not be any coding challenges tailored for beginners.

faqs.question: Are there opportunities for internships or placements during Yantra'25?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be ample opportunites depending on the event.

faqs.question: What if I forget to bring my ID card?
faqs.answer: You are not allowed to enter the venue without your ID card. Please make sure to bring it.

faqs.question: If no question found.
faqs.answer: Please contact us at yantra.sw@vit.ac.in .
